TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataTemplate extends System.Windows.FrameworkTemplate

summary.span: 說明資料物件的視覺化結構。

span.span: Describes the visual structure of a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用來指定您的資料物件的視覺效果。You use a to specify the visualization of your data objects. 當您要繫結時，物件就特別有用這類整個集合。 objects are particularly useful when you are binding an such as a to an entire collection. 沒有特定的指示，顯示集合中物件的字串表示。Without specific instructions, a displays the string representation of the objects in a collection. 在此情況下，您可以使用來定義您的資料物件的外觀。In that case, you can use a to define the appearance of your data objects. 內容您會變成您的資料物件的視覺化結構。The content of your becomes the visual structure of your data objects. 如需深入的討論，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For an in-depth discussion, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立內嵌。The following example shows how to create a inline. 指定每個資料項目會顯示為三個內的項目。The specifies that each data item appears as three elements within a . 在此範例中，資料物件是類別，稱為`Task`。In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`. 請注意，每個此範本中的項目繫結的屬性至`Task`類別。Note that each element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#Inline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#inline)] 若要定義較常見在資源區段，讓它可以是可重複使用的物件，如下列範例所示：It is more common to define a in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#AsResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#asresource)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 現在您可以使用 `myTaskTemplate` 做為資源，如下列範例所示︰Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#MyTaskTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#mytasktemplate)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料範本化範例簡介](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/DataTemplatingIntro)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/DataTemplatingIntro).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object dataType) cil managed

param.name: dataType
param.span: 如果樣板是要用於物件資料，則這是資料物件的型別名稱。

span.span: If the template is intended for object data, this is the Type name of the data object.

summary.span: 使用指定的 屬性，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要參考類別的型別名稱，請使用[X:type 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)。To refer to the Type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md). 如果樣板要用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料，這是代表資料的標記名稱的字串。If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this is the string that represents the tag name of the data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataTemplateKey As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DataTemplateKey { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the default key of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)上位於，則做為索引鍵。If you do not set the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) on a that is in a , the is used as the key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataType { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DataType : obj with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 為預期為 的項目取得或設定類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type for which this is intended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是非常類似屬性類別。This property is very similar to the property of the class. 當您設定此屬性的資料類型而不指定`x:Key`，則會自動套用到該類型的資料物件。When you set this property to the data type without specifying an `x:Key`, the gets applied automatically to data objects of that type. 請注意，當您這麼做`x:Key`隱含設定。Note that when you do that the `x:Key` is set implicitly. 因此，如果您指派此`x:Key`值，您會覆寫的隱含`x:Key`而不會自動套用。Therefore, if you assign this an `x:Key` value, you are overriding the implicit `x:Key` and the would not be applied automatically. 也請注意，如果您要繫結集合`Task`物件，不會使用自動。Also note that if you are binding a to a collection of `Task` objects, the does not use the automatically. 這是因為在繫結需要區別是否想要繫結至整個集合或個別物件的詳細資訊。This is because the binding on a needs more information to distinguish whether you want to bind to an entire collection or the individual objects. 如果您正在追蹤的選取項目類型，您可以設定屬性繫結至"`/`」 表示您感興趣的目前項目。If your is tracking the selection of an type, you can set the property of the binding to "`/`" to indicate that you are interested in the current item. 如需範例，請參閱[How to:繫結至集合並根據選取項目顯示資訊](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。For an example, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md). 否則，您必須指定明確地設定屬性。Otherwise, you need to specify the explicitly by setting the property. 屬性會特別有用，當您有不同型別的資料物件。The property is particularly useful when you have a of different types of data objects. 如果這個屬性的目標不在預設命名空間的 XML 項目，您必須在之前項目名稱與命名空間或命名空間指示項。If this property targets an XML element that is not in the default namespace, you must precede the element name with the namespace or a namespace designator. 對於公開透過 LINQ for XML 的 XML，命名空間會出現在大括號，加上大括號逸出序列：For XML exposed through LINQ for XML, the namespace appears in braces, preceded by a brace escape sequence: ```xaml ``` 對於公開透過 XPath 的 XML，項目名稱前面加上相同的執行個體所建立的命名空間指示項:For XML exposed through XPath, the element name is preceded by a namespace designator established by an instance of : ```xaml ``` ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *typeName**typeName* 如果範本用於物件資料，則此屬性會包含資料物件的型別名稱 （做為字串）。If the template is intended for object data, this property contains the type name of the data object (as a string). 若要參考類別的型別名稱，請使用[X:type 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)。To refer to the type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md). 如果樣板要用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料，此屬性包含 XML 項目名稱。If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this property contains the XML element name. 請參閱文件註解如需詳細資訊，關於指定非預設命名空間的 XML 項目。See the documentation remarks for details about specifying a non-default namespace for the XML element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Triggers As TriggerCollection
public: property System::Windows::TriggerCollection ^ Triggers { System::Windows::TriggerCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得觸發程序的集合，這些觸發程序會根據一個或多個條件來套用屬性值或執行動作。

span.span: Gets a collection of triggers that apply property values or perform actions based on one or more conditions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要建立資料範本內的觸發程序，觸發程序 setter 應該設定資料範本的範圍內的屬性。If you are creating triggers within a data template, the setters of the triggers should be setting properties that are within the scope of the data template. 否則，它可能會更適合用來建立觸發程序使用包含資料的型別為目標的樣式。Otherwise, it may be more suitable to create triggers using a style that targets the type that contains the data. 例如，如果您要繫結控制項中，容器是物件。For example, if you are binding a control, the containers are objects. 如果您使用觸發程序來設定不在範圍內的屬性，則可能是更適合建立樣式，並建立該樣式內的觸發程序。If you are using triggers to set properties that are not within the scope of the , then it may be more suitable to create a style and create triggers within that style. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱哪些內容屬於 datatemplate 的範圍？在 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see What Belongs in a DataTemplate? in the [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 此屬性只在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]透過集合語法所示，或存取的集合物件，使用其不同的方法，例如 Add。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add. 要存取的集合物件本身的屬性是唯讀，該集合本身是讀寫。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, the collection itself is read-write. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreTriggers**OneOrMoreTriggers* 零或多個物件。Zero or more objects. ## Examples 下列示範如何使用屬性。The following demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-xaml[DataBindingLab#AuctionItemDataTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/DataBindingLabApp.xaml#auctionitemdatatemplate)] 如需完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ValidateTemplatedParent(class System.Windows.FrameworkElement templatedParent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub ValidateTemplatedParent (templatedParent As FrameworkElement)

param.name: templatedParent
param.span: 這個樣板要套用的項目。

span.span: The element this template is applied to.

summary.span: 請依一組規則來檢查樣版化父代 (Parent)。

span.span: Checks the templated parent against a set of rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用下列規則：The method uses the following rules: - `templatedParent`必須為非 null 。The `templatedParent` must be a non-null . - 必須套用至。The must be applied to a .
